species.name: vanillite
descriptions: Born of an icicle, this Pokémon uses its frosty breath to make ice crystals, causing snow to fall.
It exhales cold air that is at –58 degrees Fahrenheit. When it’s in a warm place, it shrinks little by little.
It feels pleasantly cool when embraced. This Pokémon is treasured by households in warm regions.
Supposedly, this Pokémon was born from an icicle. It spews out freezing air at −58 degrees Fahrenheit to make itself more comfortable.
Theoretically, this Pokémon formed from icicles bathed in energy from the morning sun. Their breath is -58° F.

abilities.name: ice-body
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: snow-cloak
abilities.effect: Increases evasion to 1.25× during hail.  Protects against hail damage.

abilities.name: weak-armor
abilities.effect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
